title: Girl's huipil
description: open sides; U neckline on front and back with small shoulder notches; predominately red with multicolored striped fabric at sides; center panels front and back woven with multicolored geometric bands at top; blue bands embroidered with purple and yellow crisscross designs at neckline on both sides; crisscross banding in green, pink, red, orange, white and yellow edges and neckline
creditline: Gift of Patty Martinson in honor of Dr. Richard Simmons
